about_description: Sekolah Kebangsaan Bebuloh is a primary school in Labuan dedicated to nurturing excellence through holistic education and values-driven learning.

principal.name: Mr. Maidan Dali @ Sumardi Bin Yusoff
principal.message: As part of SK Bebuloh, we uphold unity and excellence in shaping young minds for a brighter future.

vision: To cultivate excellence in education through unity and values.
mission: To nurture knowledgeable and ethical students through quality teaching.
staff_page_description: Meet the dedicated educators and staff of SK Bebuloh Labuan.
